alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL KOOCHICHING COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM CDT... At 150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northwest of Margie, or 39 miles southwest of International Falls, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Koochiching County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
